mapper.insert:
insert into ts_bank
id,
disintegrate_plant_id,
bank_name,
bank_branch,
account,
payee,
create_time,
operator_id,
operator,
is_delete
VALUES
#{id},
#{disintegratePlantId},
#{bankName},
#{bankBranch},
#{account},
#{payee},
#{createTime},
#{operatorId},
#{operator},
#{isDelete}

insert into ts_car_source
id,
disintegrate_plant_id,
contacts,
phone,
count,
car_location,
user_id,
bank_id,
pay_type,
pay_Status,
pay_amount,
create_source,
create_operator,
create_operator_id,
create_time,
is_delete
VALUES
#{id},
#{disintegratePlantId},
#{contacts},
#{phone},
#{count},
#{carLocation},
#{userId},
#{bankId},
#{payType},
#{payStatus},
#{payAmount},
#{createSource},
#{createOperator},
#{createOperatorId},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDelete}
mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(s.id, '') AS id, IFNULL(s.create_time, '') AS createTime, IFNULL(s.contacts, '') AS contacts, IFNULL(s.phone,'') AS phone, IFNULL(s.car_location,'') AS carLocation, CONCAT(IFNULL(b.bank_name,''),',',IFNULL(b.bank_branch,''),',',IFNULL(b.account,'')) AS bankMessage FROM ts_car_source AS s LEFT JOIN ts_bank AS b ON s.bank_id = b.id WHERE s.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}
AND s.source_type = #{sourceType}

SELECT IFNULL(s.id, '') AS id, IFNULL(s.contacts, '') AS contacts, /*联系人*/ IFNULL(s.phone,'') AS phone, /*联系人电话*/ IFNULL(s.car_location,'') AS carLocation, /*联系人地址*/ IFNULL(s.count,'') AS count, /*车辆台次*/ IFNULL(b.bank_name,'') AS bankName, /*银行名称*/ IFNULL(b.account,'') AS account /*银行账号*/ FROM ts_car_source AS s LEFT JOIN ts_bank AS b ON s.bank_id = b.id WHERE s.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId} AND s.create_operator = #{loginName} AND s.create_operator_id = #{userId}

sql.if: AND concat(s.contacts, s.phone, s.car_location) LIKE concat("%",#{findMsg},"%")
AND concat(s.contacts, s.phone, i.car_name, i.car_no, s.car_location) LIKE concat("%",#{findMsg},"%")

mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(filed_name,'') AS filedName FROM ts_dictionary WHERE first_type = #{firstName}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ts_car_info
id,
disintegrate_plant_id,
car_source,
contacts,
contacts_phone,
car_no,
processing_type,
processing_date,
driv_license,
regist_license,
people_license,
businese_license,
break_license,
exception_license,
procedures_type,
remarks,
create_time,
operator_id,
operator,
car_name,
is_delete,
contacts_address,
car_code,
code_front,
code_in,
code_after
VALUES
#{id},
#{disintegratePlantId},
#{carSource},
#{contacts},
#{contactsPhone},
#{carNo},
#{processingType},
#{processingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{drivLicense},
#{registLicense},
#{peopleLicense},
#{busineseLicense},
#{breakLicense},
#{exceptionLicense},
#{proceduresType},
#{remarks},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{operatorId},
#{operator},
#{carName},
#{isDelete},
#{contactsAddress},
#{carCode},
#{codeFront},
#{codeIn},
#{codeAfter}

insert into ts_car_enter
id,
disintegrate_plant_id,
car_info_id,
is_approach,
approach_time,
approach_user_id,
initial_survey_time,
initial_survey_user_id,
is_initial_survey,
print_code_time,
print_code_user_id,
soft_print,
pretreatment_time,
pretreatment_user_id,
is_pretreatment,
copy_number_time,
copy_number_user_id,
is_copy_number,
dismantle_user_id,
dismantle_time,
dismantle_way,
car_location,
location_id,
is_output,
output_time,
output_user,
is_delete,
VALUES
#{id},
#{disintegratePlantId},
#{carInfoId},
#{isApproach},
#{approachTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{approachUserId},
#{initialSurveyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{initialSurveyUserId},
#{isInitialSurvey},
#{printCodeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{printCodeUserId},
#{softPrint},
#{pretreatmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{pretreatmentUserId},
#{isPretreatment},
#{copyNumberTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{copyNumberUserId},
#{isCopyNumber},
#{dismantleUserId},
#{dismantleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{dismantleWay},
#{carLocation}
#{locationId},
#{isOutput},
#{outputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{outputUser},
#{isDelete}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(id,'') AS id, IFNULL(create_time,'') AS createTime, IFNULL(contacts,'') AS contacts, IFNULL(phone,'') AS phone, IFNULL(count,'') AS count, IFNULL(car_location,'') AS carLocation FROM ts_car_source WHERE id = #{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId};

SELECT IFNULL( id, '' ) AS id, IFNULL( car_source, '' ) AS carSource, IFNULL( contacts, '' ) AS contacts, IFNULL( contacts_phone, '' ) AS contactsPhone, IFNULL( car_no, '' ) AS carNo, IFNULL( car_name, '' ) AS carName, IFNULL( contacts_address, '' ) AS contactsAddress, IFNULL( processing_type, '' ) AS processingType, IFNULL( processing_date, '' ) AS processingDate, IFNULL( driv_license, '' ) AS drivLicense, IFNULL( regist_license, '' ) AS registLicense, IFNULL( people_license, '' ) AS peopleLicense, IFNULL( businese_license, '' ) AS busineseLicense, IFNULL( break_license, '' ) AS breakLicense, IFNULL( exception_license, '' ) AS exceptionLicense, IFNULL( procedures_type, '' ) AS proceduresType, IFNULL( remarks, '' ) AS remarks FROM ts_car_info WHERE car_source = #{carSource} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId};
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_car_info SET contacts = #{contacts}, contacts_phone = #{contactsPhone}, car_no = #{carNo}, car_name = #{carName}, contacts_address = #{contactsAddress}, processing_type = #{processingType}, driv_license = #{drivLicense}, regist_license = #{registLicense}, people_license = #{peopleLicense}, businese_license = #{busineseLicense}, break_license = #{breakLicense}, exception_license = #{exceptionLicense}, procedures_type = #{proceduresType}, remarks = #{remarks}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE ts_car_source
contacts = #{contacts},
phone = #{phone},
count = #{count},
car_location = #{carLocation},
user_id = #{userId},
bank_id = #{bankId},
create_time = #{createTime}
WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ts_car_info WHERE id =#{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId};
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( id, '' ) AS id, IFNULL( contacts, '' ) AS contacts, IFNULL( count,'') AS count, IFNULL( phone, '' ) AS phone, IFNULL( user_id, '' ) AS userId, IFNULL( bank_id, '' ) AS bankId, IFNULL( car_location, '' ) AS carLocation FROM ts_car_source WHERE id = #{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId};

SELECT IFNULL( bank_name, '' ) AS bankName, IFNULL( bank_branch, '' ) AS BankBranch, IFNULL( account, '' ) AS account, IFNULL( payee, '' ) AS payee, IFNULL( create_time, '' ) AS createTime FROM ts_bank WHERE id = #{bankId};
mapper.update:
UPDATE ts_bank
bank_name = #{bankName},
bank_branch = #{bankBranch},
account = #{account},
payee = #{payee},
create_time = #{createTime}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(i.id,'') AS id, IFNULL(i.car_code,'') AS carCode, IFNULL(i.car_no,'') AS carNo, IFNULL(d.vin,'') AS vin, IFNULL(e.approach_time,'') AS approachTime FROM ts_car_info AS i Left JOIN ts_car_source AS o ON i.car_source = o.id LEFT JOIN ts_car_identity AS d ON i.id = d.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter AS e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing AS p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId} AND create_operator = #{loginName} AND create_operator_id = #{userId} AND p.is_query = 2 AND p.is_verify = 2
AND CONCAT(i.car_no,i.car_name,i.car_code) LIKE CONCAT("%",#{findMsg},"%")

SELECT IFNULL(e.id,'') AS id, IFNULL(e.car_info_id,'') AS carInfoId FROM ts_car_info AS i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter AS e ON i.id = e.car_info_id WHERE car_no = #{carNo} AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}
mapper.insert:

id,
disintegrate_plant_id,
car_info_id,
create_time,
self_weight,
create_operator,
create_operator_id,
card_color
VALUES
#{id},
#{disintegratePlantId},
#{carInfoId},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{selfWeight},
#{createOperator},
#{createOperatorId},
#{cardColor}

INSERT INTO ts_car_pic
id,
disintegrate_plant_id,
file_name,
file_url,
first_type,
two_type,
car_info_id,
operator_id,
operator,
create_time,
is_delete,
VALUES
#{id},
#{disintegratePlantId},
#{fileName},
#{fileUrl},
#{firstType},
#{twoType},
#{carInfoId},
#{operatorId},
#{operator},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDelete},
mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.car_no, i.car_code, i.car_name, p.verify_result, p.verify_time FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE i.id = #{id} AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId} AND p.is_verify = 3

SELECT i.id AS id, i.car_no AS carNo, i.car_name AS carName, i.car_code AS carCode, e.approach_time AS approachTime FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter e ON i.id = e.car_info_id WHERE i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId} AND e.is_approach = 2 AND e.is_initial_survey = 1
AND CONCAT(i.car_no,i.car_name,i.car_code) LIKE CONCAT("%",#{findMsg},"%")

SELECT i.id AS id, i.car_no AS carNo, i.car_name AS carName, i.car_code AS carCode, e.approach_time AS approachTime FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter e ON i.id = e.car_info_id WHERE i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId} AND i.id = #{id}

SELECT IFNULL( id, '' ) AS id, IFNULL( disintegrate_plant_id, '' ) AS disintegratePlantId, IFNULL( car_info_id, '' ) AS carInfoId, IFNULL( plate_count, '' ) AS plateCount, IFNULL( car_degree, '' ) AS carDegree, IFNULL( condition_pump_count, '' ) AS conditionPumpCount, IFNULL( battery_count, '' ) AS batteryCount, IFNULL( motor_count, '' ) AS motorCount, IFNULL( door_count, '' ) AS doorCount, IFNULL( alloy_rim_count, '' ) AS alloyRimCount, IFNULL( cistern_count, '' ) AS cisternCount, IFNULL( electrical_machinery_count, '' ) AS electricalMachineryCount, IFNULL( tyre_count, '' ) AS tyreCount, IFNULL( chair_count, '' ) AS chairCount, IFNULL( conditioner_count, '' ) AS conditionerCount, IFNULL( catalytic_converter_count, '' ) AS catalyticConverterCount, IFNULL( is_alloy_rim, '' ) AS isAlloyRim, IFNULL( remark, '' ) AS remark FROM ts_car_survey WHERE car_info_id = #{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_car_survey SET plate_count = #{plateCount}, car_degree = #{carDegree}, condition_pump_count = #{conditionPumpCount}, battery_count = #{batteryCount}, motor_count = #{motorCount}, door_count = #{doorCount}, alloy_rim_count = #{alloyRimCount}, cistern_count = #{cisternCount}, electrical_machinery_count = #{electricalMachineryCount}, tyre_count = #{tyreCount}, chair_count = #{chairCount}, conditioner_count = #{conditionerCount}, catalytic_converter_count = #{catalyticConverterCount}, remark = #{remark}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_operator = #{createOperator}, create_operator_id = #{createOperatorId}, is_alloy_rim = #{isAlloyRim} WHERE id = #{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}

UPDATE ts_car_enter SET is_initial_survey = 2, initial_survey_time = #{initialSurveyTime}, initial_survey_user_id = #{initialSurveyUserId}, is_pretreatment = 1 WHERE car_info_id = #{carInfoId} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}
mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(i.id,'') AS id, IFNULL(i.car_no,'') AS carNo, IFNULL(i.car_name,'') AS carName, IFNULL(i.car_code,'') AS carCode, IFNULL(e.approach_time,'') AS approachTime FROM ts_car_info AS i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter AS e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_survey AS s ON i.id = s.car_info_id WHERE i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId} AND s.dismantling_way != 5 AND i.car_location_area IS NULL OR i.car_location_area = ''
AND CONCAT(i.car_no,i.car_name,i.car_code) LIKE CONCAT("%",#{findMsg},"%")
SELECT IFNULL( id, '' ) AS id, IFNULL( car_location, '' ) AS carLocation FROM ts_car_location WHERE disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId} AND pid = #{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_car_info SET car_location_area = #{carLocationArea}, car_location_row = #{carLocationRow}, car_location_column = #{carLocationColumn}, car_location_number = #{carLocationNumber} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM ts_car_enter WHERE car_info_id = ( SELECT id FROM ts_car_info WHERE car_no = #{carNo} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}) AND is_approach = 2
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_car_survey SET dismantling_way = #{dismantlingWay} WHERE car_info_id = #{carInfoId} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ts_car_processing
id,
disintegrate_plant_id,
car_info_id
VALUES
#{id},
#{disintegratePlantId},
#{carInfoId}

INSERT INTO ts_car_identity
id,
disintegrate_plant_id,
car_info_id
VALUES
#{id},
#{disintegratePlantId},
#{carInfoId}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( i.id, '' ) AS id, IFNULL( i.car_code, '' ) AS carCode, IFNULL( i.car_no, '' ) AS carNo, IFNULL( i.car_name, '' ) AS carName, IFNULL( d.vin, '' ) AS vin, IFNULL( d.displacement, '' ) AS displacement, IFNULL( e.is_approach, '' ) AS isApproach, IFNULL( e.is_initial_survey, '' ) AS isInitialSurvey, IFNULL( e.is_pretreatment, '' ) AS isPretreatment, IFNULL( e.is_copy_number, '' ) AS isCopyNumber, IFNULL( p.is_verify, '' ) AS isVerify, IFNULL( p.is_destructive, '' ) AS isDestructive, IFNULL( p.is_appoint_logout_time, '' ) AS isAppointLogoutTime, IFNULL( p.is_upload_pic, '' ) AS isUploadPic, IFNULL( CONCAT( i.car_location_area, ' ', i.car_location_row, ' ', i.car_location_column, ' ', i.car_location_number ), '' ) AS carAddress, IFNULL( p.verify_result, '' ) AS verifyResult FROM ts_car_info AS i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter AS e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_identity AS d ON i.id = d.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing AS p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE i.car_code = #{carCode} AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}

( SELECT '待初检' type,count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter e ON i.id = e.car_info_id WHERE e.is_approach = 2 AND e.is_initial_survey = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待预处理', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter e ON i.id = e.car_info_id WHERE e.is_initial_survey = 2 AND e.is_pretreatment = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待拓号', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter e ON i.id = e.car_info_id WHERE is_pretreatment = 2 AND is_copy_number = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待打印软牌', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter e ON i.id = e.car_info_id WHERE e.soft_print = 1 AND e.is_approach = 2 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待确认拆解方式', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_survey u ON i.id = u.car_info_id WHERE u.dismantling_way = 5 AND e.is_copy_number = 2 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待登记', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE e.is_copy_number = 2 AND p.is_register = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待查询', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE p.is_register = 2 AND p.is_query = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待核档', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE p.is_query = 2 AND p.is_verify = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待毁型', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE p.is_verify = 2 AND p.is_destructive = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待拆解', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE p.is_destructive = 2 AND p.is_dismantle = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待上传商委数据', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE p.is_destructive = 2 AND p.is_data_upload = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待打印回收证明', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE p.is_data_upload = 2 AND p.is_print_recycle = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待录入注销时间', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE p.is_print_recycle = 2 AND p.is_logout = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待录入商委注销时间', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id WHERE p.is_logout = 2 AND p.is_appoint_logout_time = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT '待领取残值', count( 1 ) AS num FROM ts_car_info i LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing p ON i.id = p.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_salvage AS s ON i.id = s.car_info_id WHERE p.is_appoint_logout_time = 2 AND s.is_get_salvage = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = 1 )

SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM ts_car_info AS i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter AS e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing AS p ON i.id = p.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_survey AS u ON i.id = u.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_salvage AS s ON i.id = s.car_info_id WHERE e.soft_print = 1 AND e.is_approach = 2 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}

SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM ts_car_info AS i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter AS e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing AS p ON i.id = p.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_survey AS u ON i.id = u.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_salvage AS s ON i.id = s.car_info_id WHERE u.dismantling_way = 5 AND e.is_approach = 2 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}

SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM ts_car_info AS i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter AS e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing AS p ON i.id = p.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_survey AS u ON i.id = u.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_salvage AS s ON i.id = s.car_info_id WHERE e.is_approach = 2 AND p.is_destructive = 2 AND p.is_dismantle = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}

SELECT COUNT(i.id) FROM ts_car_info AS i LEFT JOIN ts_car_enter AS e ON i.id = e.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_processing AS p ON i.id = p.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_procedure_log AS g ON i.id = g.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_survey AS u ON i.id = u.car_info_id LEFT JOIN ts_car_salvage AS s ON i.id = s.car_info_id WHERE e.is_approach = 2 AND (p.is_query = 3 OR p.is_verify = 3) AND (g.type = 1 OR g.type = 2) AND g.state = 1 AND i.disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ts_car_source WHERE id =#{id} AND disintegrate_plant_id = #{disintegratePlantId}
